mapper.select: SELECT e.department_no , d.edms_doc_no , d.title , e.id , d.submit_dt FROM edms_doc d JOIN employees e ON d.id = e.id ORDER BY d.submit_dt DESC

SELECT e.department_no ,d.edms_doc_no ,d.title ,e.id ,d.submit_dt ,d.approval_status FROM edms_doc d JOIN employees e ON d.id = e.id WHERE d.approval_status = #{approvalStatus} ORDER BY d.submit_dt DESC
SELECT e.department_no, d.edms_doc_no, d.title, e.id, d.submit_dt FROM edms_doc d JOIN employees e ON d.id = e.id WHERE e.department_no = #{departmentNo} ORDER BY d.submit_dt DESC

SELECT e.department_no, d.edms_doc_no, d.title, e.id, d.submit_dt, d.approval_status FROM edms_doc d JOIN employees e ON d.id = e.id WHERE d.approval_status = #{approvalStatus} AND e.department_no = #{departmentNo} ORDER BY d.submit_dt DESC
